pr_title: Add missing .gitignore in child Maven modules kie-dmn-pmml-tests-parent

timeline.message: Add missing .gitignore in child Maven modules kie-dmn-pmml-tests-parent

timeline.bodyText:
if you omit starting slash .* will be used for all directory levels of dot files and other .gitignore files won't be needed.
The same is for
/.ipr
/.iws
/*.iml
timeline.author: mareknovotny

replies.bodyText: Yes I very well know this, but since the mandate was to use a single format for .gitignore this is the situation
replies.author: tarilabs
